mapper.select: select NOTICE_IDX, NOTICE_TITLE, USER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(NOTICE_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_READCOUNT from NOTICE_BOARD order by NOTICE_IDX desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.insert: insert into NOTICE_BOARD (NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONT, USER_ID, NOTICE_REGDATE) values(#{notice_title}, #{notice_cont}, #{notice_user}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_IDX, NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONT, USER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(NOTICE_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_READCOUNT from NOTICE_BOARD where NOTICE_IDX = #{idx}
